title: OtherIndex
description: Specification of a user-defined index that does not meet the criteria of other Index data types.

description.description: A description that defines the OtherIndex.

provider.description: The organisation that creates or maintains the Index.

assetClass.description: The Asset Class of the Index.

exchange.description: If the Index is listed, defines the public exchange(s) of the listing.

relatedExchange.description: Provides the related Exchanges, if applicable.

identifierType.description: Defines the symbology source of the Asset Identifier, eg CUSIP, ISIN, etc.
